ing: 1 (9 ounce) pouch Progressoâ„¢ Recipe Startersâ„¢ creamy three cheese cooking sauce
1 (3 ounce) package cooked real bacon pieces or bits
ProgressoÂ® Italian style panko crispy bread crumbs
des: "Bacon-spiked macaroni and cheese in just 15 minutes! Our Progressoâ„¢ Recipe StartersÂ® creamy three cheese cooking sauce plus American cheese slices make it extra cheesy and creamy. Check our oven directions if you prefer you mac baked."
ins:
Cook and drain pasta as directed on package; keep warm.
Meanwhile, in 2-quart saucepan, heat cooking sauce to boiling, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat; stir in cheese until melted. Reserve 1 tablespoon of the bacon; set aside. Stir in pasta and remaining bacon. If necessary, cook over medium heat until thoroughly heated, stirring occasionally. Mix reserved bacon with bread crumbs; sprinkle over pasta.
